card-description: A set of kitchen utensils - everything you may need while cooking. The set is a perfect gift for mom, girlfriend or loved one. The set includes 11 items and a stand. Namely: handy frying spatula with oil drain, baking spatula, whisk, tongs, flat spoon, spatula with oil drain holes, ladle, salad spoon, butter brush, spoon with holes (mini slotted spoon) and spaghetti spoon. The set is made of silicone with a non-stick coating that can withstand various temperature loads and bamboo handles, which makes the set completely safe for human health. The stand is made of plastic.
